Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' leading to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' by 'STAFF MEMBER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' that are not dismissed
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' over 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' in variants leading to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' that precede 'Request Payment'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Request Payment' occurs

Name: Total 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' performed by 'SYSTEM'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' over 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in successful claim processes
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' in relation to all approval activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Fraction of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' that lead to a 'Payment Handled' without rejections
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' per year
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Average number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' in a month
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'
